Gene.FullName: PMS1 homolog 2, mismatch repair system component

Classification.Comment: The c.2439delG variant, located in coding exon 14 of the PMS2 gene, results from a deletion of one nucleotide at nucleotide position 2439, causing a translational frameshift with a predicted alternate stop codon (p.K814Sfs*3). This alteration is expected to result in loss of function by premature protein truncation or nonsense-mediated mRNA decay. As such, this alteration is interpreted as a disease-causing mutation.

SubmissionNameList.SubmissionName: All AVA3 Novel and Update Variants_103122
